businesses.name: Charlie and the Carob Tree
businesses.business_details: Born out of a search for a chocolate alternative when I was no longer able to eat chocolate. Chemo left me with lots of good intolerances but with the desire to still enjoy creamy chocolatey goodness and now I have the privilege to share the love with everyone else, young, old and in between, vegans, as well as those with allergies, those passionate to be healthy and fit and everyone else.
businesses.product_details: Chocolatey Carob Polka Dot freckles, Buttons and Bars, healthy alternative to chocolate without the caffeine. Creamy and delicious and perfect for kids of all ages.
businesses.headline: Charlie and the Carob Tree...Vegan, dairy free and gluten free...you’ll never guess it’s not chocolate!
